description:
Against the savage monsters that lurk outside the glass walls of Flandore, the last remnants of humanity have only one defense: the mana magic wielded only by members of the Noble class. When Melida, heiress to House of Angel, fails to manifest her magic upon reaching majority, the half-vampire Kufa is sent with orders from her own Grandfather to resolve the issue… and if Melida cannot manifest mana, Kufa is to execute her for the crime of impure blood. But when Melida fails the test, Kufa can’t bring himself to kill the spirited young woman whose only fault was to have an adulterous mother. And so, instead, he commits the crime of giving Melida some of his own mana.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonyms: แอสแซสซินส์ ไพรด์)

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Steampunk
tags.description: Prominently features technology and designs inspired by 19th-century industrial steam-powered machinery.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

node.description:
[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

**Height:** 155 cm (5'1")

**[Website](https://www.kusunokitomori.com/) | [Profile (SMA)](https://www.sma.co.jp/s/sma/artist/441?ima=0000#/news/0) | [Profile (SMA VOICE)](http://smavoice.jp/s/sma03/artist/45?ima=5736) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tomori_kusunoki)**

A Japanese voice actress who is currently affiliated with the Sony Music Artists agency. She made her voice acting debut in 2017, and in the same year she was cast in her first main role as Kirara, the heroine of the Japanese mobile game _Kirara Fantasia_. 

In September 2022, [Tomori announced her diagnosis with Ehlers-Danlos syndrome (EDS) affecting her joints](https://www.kusunokitomori.com/info/archive/?id=546582), which limits her ability to engage in physically demanding activities such as dancing. [It was announced on Love Live!’s website at the same time](https://www.lovelive-anime.jp/news/01_1248.html) that she would be graduating from the role of [Setsuna Yuuki](https://anilist.co/character/132796/Yuki-Setsuna) in March 2023, with [Coco Hayashi](https://anilist.co/staff/124857) replacing her in the role.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
- [Vice](https://anilist.co/character/277198) - Alchemy Stars (VG)
- [Kanade Yoisaki](https://anilist.co/character/249636) - Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku (VG)
- Viper - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Seattle](https://anilist.co/character/197197), [I-58](https://anilist.co/character/228624), Glasgow - Azur Lane (VG)
- [Aunn Komano](https://anilist.co/character/145527) - Touhou Cannonball (VG)
- Vanessa - Cytus II (VG)
- [Ruka Kayamori](https://anilist.co/character/321897) - Heaven Burns Red (VG)
- [Firefly](https://anilist.co/character/349493) - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)

node.description: Website | Twitter | Blog (JP) __Formed:__ July 30, 2017 Biography: Run Girls, Run! (abbreviated as RGR) is an idol group created for the [Wake Up, Girls!](https://anilist.co/anime/19023) (franchise). Much like Wake Up, Girls!, the unit acts as a fictional group in the [Wake Up, Girls!](https://anilist.co/anime/19023/Wake-Up-Girls/) universe and also take part in real life idol activities. They made their first anime appearance in Wake Up, Girls! New Chapter. Run Girls, Run! was formed through the "avex x 81 Produce Wake Up, Girls! AUDITION 3rd Anisong Vocal Audition". The group made their real life debut at the Wonder Festival "WONDERFUL HOBBY LIFE FOR YOU!!26" event by singing covers of 16-Sai no Agape and Tachiagare!. Members: Hayashi Koko（林鼓子） Hayashi Koko who is born May 15, 2002 in Shizuoka Prefecture, Japan is a voice actress (seiyuu) affiliated with the agency 81 Produce. She voices Hayashi Ayumi (速志歩) in the Wake Up, Girls! (franchise), starting with Wake Up, Girls! Shin Shou, which is in fact her first voice acting role. Morishima Yuka（森嶋優花） Morishima Yuka who is born March 16, 1997 in Kyoto, Japan is a voice actress (seiyuu) affiliated with 81 Produce. She voices Morishima Otome (守島音芽) in the Wake Up, Girls! (franchise), starting with Wake Up, Girls! Shin Shou, which is in fact her first voice acting role as well. Atsugi Nanami（厚木那奈美） Atsugi Nanami who is born October 11, 1997 in Nagano Prefecture, Japan is a voice actress (seiyuu) affiliated with 81 Produce. She voices Atsugi Itsuka (阿津木いつか) in the Wake Up, Girls! (franchise), starting with Wake Up, Girls! Shin Shou, which is in fact also her first voice acting role. (Source: rungirlsrun.jp) It was announced via Twitter on March 31, 2023 that Run Girls, Run! had disbanded.
_Note: Not to be confused with either the [scriptwriter](https://anilist.co/staff/118512/) or [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/218342/) by the same name._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/HdkzTanaka)

__Birthplace:__ Osaka Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Kobe University (Faculty of Developmental Sciences, Department of Human Representation)

__Hidekazu Tanaka__ is a Japanese composer and arranger.

He left MONACA on July 31, 2021, and went independent. 

On October 24, 2022, he was arrested on suspicion of sexual assault of a teenage girl in Meguro, Tokyo in August of that year. On March 15, 2023, Tanaka admitted to obscenity charges which included saying obscene language to a 15-year-old girl, along with admitting to voyeurism at least dozens of times in the past 10 years.
